column4: Protestant Christians retain  Hindu name- either the first name or the last name.
Example Joseph Pradeep. Joseph the Christian name and Pradeep the Hindu name
Catholic Christians have both Christian names. Example Joseph D'Cruz
Buddhist and Jain have Hindu names
Sikh names are not specific to genders
Most Parsi names have Muslim names
Most surname of Parsis will have their family profession attached to it.
Example: One who sells bottles will be Bottlewala. 'Wala' meaning person
Many Muslim, Parsi, Hindu and Christain names have overlapped
Liberal people use names that do not have a specific identity to a particular religion/s

column6: Buddhist and Jain have Hindu names
